channel.title: wagtail on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in wagtail on Blog

item.title: Create Page In Migration
item.description: How to create page in migration Question After data migration with Page model subclass object creation it doesn’t appear in admin Answer # 1 - get your home page home_page = HomePage.objects.first() # this will get the first HomePage # 2 - create a page instance, this is not yet stored in the DB page = Page( title='title', slug='slug' ) # 3 - create the new page as a child of the parent (home), this puts a new page in the DB home_page.
